title: Los Santos Drug Wars
headline: Los Santos Drug Wars
subtitle: How to Use the Acid Lab
content:
The Acid Lab allows you to produce and sell your own brand of psychedelics. Inside the vehicle, you'll be able to kick off Resupply Missions as well as Sell Missions once you have enough stock. To make some quick cash, Acid can also be sold to the new Street Dealers found in Freemode.

It's still important to stay in touch with your new contact, Dax, once The First Dose is complete. Keep reading to find out why.
